title: Low blow?
body:
So instead of listening to people when they were willing to give you solutions, you gave them shit for it and made them lose all hope and become trolls. Then you have the audacity to permaban them. How fragile are your egos, Heralds? You guys are pathetic. You threw your own under the bus constantly, and now you silence them because you are too scared to hear what they have to say. Funnily enough, many are waking up and the boards will be littered with unhappy board users. Are you gonna permaban them as well? 
You can ban me for this, it's not gonna matter. I don't care anymore. 
Your fragile and over-inflated egos are evident.

Take note everyone, you'll get permabanned for addressing core issues. 


In the end, they won, kinda sucks that you removed mod messages, huh? Won't even get the last word. Shoutout to my boy Ulan for being the biggest chicken of the coop.

replies.body: Its not really a perma ban if it ends in 114 years, sure it will be 1 hell of a wait but its not permanent.

If you look, this whole Discuss the Boards have been very verbal about the platform issues. I am not going to go into the reasons of another users permaban for the sake of privacy, but there is a distinct difference in-between criticism and harassment and misconstruing words.

> You gave them shit for it and made them lose all hope and become trolls.

I think this speaks for itself. If you have decided the only way the platform is to exist is to burn in a fire, and to harass and troll moderators and the community every chance you get, you don't belong here. Period.
